bibl.title: Shifting Social Imaginaries in the Hellenistic Period. Narrations, Practices, and Images
bibl.note: Originated in a conference held at the Internationales Wissenschaftsforum Heidelberg, November 10 to 11, 2011. - 15 contributions. - Pp. 1-21: Introduction (E.S.); - 426: Index of sources. 3. Papyri. - Part One. Change and Continuity. - Part Two. Modes of Cultural Appropriation. - Part Three. Shifting Worldviews. - Epilogue.
bibl.seg: Eftychia Stavrianopoulou (ed.), Shifting Social Imaginaries in the Hellenistic Period. Narrations, Practices, and Images = Mnemosyne. Supplementum 363.
Leiden, E.J. Brill, 2013, 8°, xviii-436 pp., 2 cartes, 22 figg. ISBN 978-90-04-25798-6. €134.

Originated in a conference held at the Internationales Wissenschaftsforum Heidelberg, November 10 to 11, 2011. - 15 contributions. - Pp. 1-21: Introduction (E.S.); - 426: Index of sources. 3.
